page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
The Children who contributed to the Survey were the Junior 3 & 4 groups in Class 4 at Sacred Heart School:-
Nicola Ballantyne : Annette McMeekin Rachel Ballantyne : Gary Milner Stuart Beck : Karen Milner Tony Bowron : Colin Nelson Sarah Bray : Lisa Murphy Kerry Critchley : Sarah Perry John Dixon : Dominic Poole Roisin Doran : Donna Rigg Marie Giddings : Julie Tomkinson William Glasgow : Sara Wood Sarah Heywood
Amongst many others whose help we called on, special mention must go to Dr.J.G.Jackson of Barrow for the wealth of information he provided about Walney Island.
